document_data.name: Bloody Scar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bloody Scar''' were an [[orc]]ish tribe that inhabited the [[Greypeak Mountains]] and the northern reaches of the [[Fallen Lands]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Like most orc tribes in the Fallen Lands, the Bloody Scar occasionally rode upon [[axebeak]]s. While doing so, they typically wielded [[lance]]s or [[shortbow]]s.
document_data.Relationships: The other orcish tribes that inhabited the Graypeak Mountains and northern Fallen Lands, ruled by petty and constantly feuding kings, showed fealty to the Bloody Scar tribe and their leader. These included the [[Black Bone]], [[Black Slasher]], [[Seven Eye]], and [[Severed Fist]] tribes.
document_data.Members: This tribe was ruled by an orc known as [[Ogrash]].
